fenderStrat1982.name: Fender Stratocaster 1982
fenderStrat1982.description: Vintage 1982 Fender Stratocaster in excellent playing condition. Some wear consistent with age. Original pickups.

mahaloUkelele.name: Mahalo Ukelele
mahaloUkelele.description: A vibrant Mahalo Ukelele, perfect for beginners and seasoned players looking for a fun, portable instrument.

taylorGsCustom.name: Taylor GS Custom
taylorGsCustom.description: A stunning Taylor GS Custom acoustic guitar with rich tones and beautiful craftsmanship.

gibsonLesPaul1978.name: Gibson Les Paul 1978
gibsonLesPaul1978.description: A classic 1978 Gibson Les Paul Standard, delivering iconic rock tones. Shows play wear typical for its age.

jasmineC22.name: Jasmine C22
jasmineC22.description: The Jasmine JC-22 is a 3/4 size classical guitar that's an excellent choice for the young, aspiring player.

jdLuthiers.name: J&D Luthiers
jdLuthiers.description: A finely crafted instrument from J&D Luthiers, offering exceptional playability and tone.

fenderSquire.name: Fender Squier Stratocaster
fenderSquire.description: A great entry-level Stratocaster from Squier by Fender, offering classic looks and tones.

fenderSrv.name: Fender SRV Stratocaster
fenderSrv.description: Fender Stevie Ray Vaughan Signature Stratocaster, built to the specs of the legendary blues guitarist.

gretschGt567.name: Gretsch GT567 Electromatic
gretschGt567.description: The Gretsch GT567 Electromatic offers classic Gretsch hollow body tones and style at an accessible price.

fenderPrincetonAmp.name: Fender Princeton Amp
fenderPrincetonAmp.description: Classic Fender Princeton reverb amplifier, known for its lush reverb and tremolo.

korgMinilogue.name: Korg Minilogue
korgMinilogue.description: A powerful and versatile analog synthesizer with a fully programmable interface.
